description: Even following the tutorial and releasing all permissions. The Google Chrome plugin does not work. It worked fine on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. Both installations were done through SNAP.
summary: Very good, but not working on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS

description: The browser Add-On is not able to connect to a running enpass session even though all permissions have been given as presented in Description for Snap Firefox. Interestingly in Pop OS 22.04 it works just fine.
summary: Does not work on Ubuntu 22.04 even after giving all permissions

description: I use this password manager across all my devices, and with cloud integration I don't have to worry about forgetting my passwords
One of the best Password Managers out there

I have used Enpass on Windows, Mac and now Linux and have not lost any data exporting and importing between Platforms. I also like the fact that it stores data locally and supports recording software license information with attachments.
I use this app in all platforms, iOS, Mac, Ubuntu, Windows. They all work great.
I love Enpass; have been using it for years on all possible platforms. This snap does install but then, sadly, it won't start. You click the icon and nothing happens.
summary: doesn't work for me on ubuntu 21.04

description: Works perfectly for all my devices, and syncs through cloud-provider
Can it really only access files in your home directory. That makes it pretty useless. Might just be a snap thing ... so many problems with snap!

Years ago I've switched from 1Password to Enpass. Since then
I've been using Enpass daily on my Mac, Windows, iPhone and Linux (Ubuntu) without any troubles.

It sync and works perfectly across devices.
I have to work on multiple platforms. This syncs across platforms, and includes OTP. I highly recommend it.
Lässt sich unter Ubuntu 21.04 nicht öffnen
summary: Lässt sich unter Ubuntu 21.04 nicht öffnen

description: Multiplataforma, sencilla y segura. No guarda la contraseña maestra, que habrá que conservarla muy bien

Application bien pensée, aucun bug en 1 an d'utilisation. possibilité d'importer mots de passe depuis pas mal d'autres applications.
Version gratuite sur Pc mais limitée à 15 entrées sur mobile.
dispo sur android et iphone

et le plus important, pas de synchro avec le cloud. 
Les mots de passes sont chiffrés et stochés sur PC avec possibilité de sauvegarde chiffrée sur dropbox.
